response.overview: One night per year, the government sanctions a 12-hour period in which citizens can commit any crime they wish -- including murder -- without fear of punishment or imprisonment. Leo, a sergeant who lost his son, plans a vigilante mission of revenge during the mayhem. However, instead of a death-dealing avenger, he becomes the unexpected protector of four innocent strangers who desperately need his help if they are to survive the night.
response.title: The Purge: Anarchy

titles.title: Anarchy: La noche de las bestias
人类清除计划2：无政府状态

results.name: The group takes a shortcut through the city
